----

Please fill out either the **bug or feature request** section and remove whatever section you are not using.
If issue is reported from a customer, please label the issues as customercomplaint
Please provide links to any requirements, formal customer complaint forms, or other supporting resources.
Only one issue per issue. If the feature has multiple issues, please file separate issues.

Questions:
1. Do screenshots or video of the issue exist?
2. Is there a data file or test setup to attach to support request?
3. Will a developer looking at this in a month be able to reproduce the issue?
